scripts.dev: node -e "console.log('Starting development server...'); console.log('Open index.html in your browser or use a local web server');"
scripts.analyze: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const files = ['styles.css', 'app.js', 'index.html']; files.forEach(f => { if(fs.existsSync(f)) { const size = fs.statSync(f).size; console.log(f + ': ' + Math.round(size/1024*100)/100 + ' KB'); } });"
